tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Black Ops
programme.desc: A Naval aviator, while temporarily assigned to a SEAL team, drowns at sea; he was the son of a woman senator.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Survivors
programme.desc: In a civilian court Harm represents a divorced (and emotionally baffled) Marine colonel, who has gotten into trouble over an unauthorized visit with his minor son.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Recovery
programme.desc: A Navy astronaut dies during a drill while preparing for a space mission to repair a satellite.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Prisoner
programme.desc: Chicom agents capture Harm in Hong Kong; they vigorously question him in mainland China about official matters.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ares
programme.desc: Someone kills a Naval officer on Okinawa, then his ship encounters major trouble during war games at sea.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: And More Civil War
programme.desc: Just as Team Scorpion makes headway against the hackers controlling U.S. naval destroyers, they learn that a U.S. nuclear submarine also has been hacked and has a missile about to launch.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.sub-title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
programme.desc: When Walter is accidentally launched into space in a rocket, he hallucinates about Paige as his oxygen runs low, and Team Scorpion works feverishly to find a way to bring him home before he suffocates.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Little Boy Lost
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must find a boy from Ralph's class who goes missing on a field trip after he accidentally has a run-in with a deadly criminal. Also, Toby gets closer to finding out the identity of Happy's husband.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Plight At The Museum
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Museum turns deadly when they discover thieves robbing a rare gem exhibit in order to get materials needed to enrich a nuclear bomb.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Bat Poop Crazy
programme.desc: Before Halloween, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a deep, vast cave system in order to prevent a bat population from destroying the North America ecosystem.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.sub-title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.desc: On Election Day, as democracy hangs in the balance, Team Scorpion is called on when someone tries to throw the U.S. presidential election into chaos.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fragments
programme.desc: Andy’s former rookie, Duncan, is back on duty and looking to reconcile – something she’s not ready for yet. But personal feelings get thrust aside when a bomb explodes in a downtown parking garage.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to the mysterious Guys Cliffe House, once a private dwelling, it is now home to the Fraternal Brotherhood of Freemasons. The team are followed by a very persistent poltergeist that will seem to stop at nothing to get their attention.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: From the start activity prevalent in this historical building. Glen is faced with something unexplained early on, Gregg is faced with his most demanding vigil yet and the rest of team chase a sinister shadow that lurks in the dark corridor.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation, moving from the cellar to the upper floors. While Yvette and Glen explore the auditorium, something follows Karl upstairs, and the rest of the team captures some of their best evidence yet.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: An all but deserted manor house that boasts murder, death and intrigue among its history becomes the setting for one of the most intriguing investigation to date. The team are showered with object that appear to land in the same way.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and team are put to the test as activity seems to be all around them, something is following them but who or what. Could it be the spirit of a man they connect who died near the house over 100 years ago?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Well of Horror
programme.desc: TAPS is joined by Jason's daughter, Haily, on two cases; The Shanley Hotel in Napanoch, New York and Old Fort Niagara, in Youngstown, New York. Both cases involve a gruesome death that took place at a well, instigating paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hoover Damned
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Boulder City, Nevada to investigate Boulder City Hospital.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost of Carnegie
programme.desc: TAPS is called out to the Carnegie Library of Homestead, in Pennsylvania to investigate a site that once held violent riots between legendary capitalist, Mr. Carnegie and the steel workers. It is believed that Mr.Carnegie still haunts the library.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS visits the location of the \\"shot heard round the world\\" at the Colonial Inn in Concord, Massachusetts.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 16
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hyde & Seek
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Cooperstown, New York, to investigate Hyde Hall.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The Magog eggs in Harper are starting to hatch, so the team builds a Teseract machine.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan takes over a tourist barge in an attempt to escape mercenaries.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Be All My Sins Remembered
programme.desc: A body identification goes awry when it turns out Beka's former crewmate isn't dead at all.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Dance of the Mayflies
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues dying people from a drift, but they soon turn into zombies being controlled by a hive-mind.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: In Heaven Now Are Three
programme.desc: The engine of creation is capable of rewriting the universe according to the owner's wishes. Dylan, Beka and Trance must obtain it before someone with dark plans gets it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Things We Cannot Change
programme.desc: A black hole knocks out Dylan and sends him into an alternative reality with a wife and child.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.253
programme.desc: A man is suing his ex-girlfriend’s son for allegedly stealing his dog and for purposely ramming his car with his bicycle.\t\t\t\r\nA loan to pay life insurance, the return of property, and alleged harassment are disputed by ex-lovers.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.248
programme.desc: A woman and her mother sue their former friend for furniture return; he claims they owe him a loan. Another woman sues her son's ex-friend's mother for car impound costs.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.26
programme.desc: Intoxicated bride sues friend for face punch at wedding, accused teen claims self-defense/Woman accuses ex of cheating, he defends as moving on; dispute over living room set balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.94
programme.desc: A single mother dips into her savings to bail an ex-boyfriend out of jail after he was arrested for not paying child support.A woman sues her granddaughter for money she allegedly borrowed to pay for her prom.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.260
programme.desc: A young woman sues for damages after a catfight at a party. Another woman claims chest contusions from breaking up the fight and sues the man she alleges beat her up.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.128
programme.desc: While deployed in Iraq, a woman claims the father of her child had promised to take care of her car but damaged the vehicle instead/A fifty-dollar loan and unpaid rent land feuding ex-roommates in court.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.72
programme.desc: Teen maid of honor sued for failing wedding duties; new bride's father claims cost of missed event plane ticket. Earthquake interrupts courtroom during ex-lovers' case over stolen money allegedly used for drugs.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.229
programme.desc: A woman denies filing a retaliatory restraining order after finding her ex-fiancé with someone else; accused of kicking his bedroom door. Another woman sued for passing fraudulent check in secret-shopper scam.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.172
programme.desc: Man not father of child, sues mother for alleged loans. Jailed vegan seeks bailout due to prison food, friend demands repayment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.119
programme.desc: Custody of a pit bull rescued from the pound is disputed by a man and his daughter; he says she abandoned the dog at his home/A woman sues her former friend for the cost of bailing her out of jail after she was arrested for false imprisonment.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.103
programme.desc: Threats to kill kittens, questionable remarks about a man’s sexuality and inappropriate, drunken toasts after the death of a child come into play when ex-friends fight over alleged vandalism.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay asks the chefs to create three Asian-fusion dishes using poultry, seafood and beef. Both teams crack under pressure when they go head-to-head during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must prepare food for a bar mitzvah. After one contestant is eliminated, the top 10 chefs are revealed.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams try their hands at tapas-style dining using the day's leftovers and one chef's mistake nearly sabotages both teams' performances.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Ramsay tests the chefs' palates. Celebrity diners Eric McCormack and Robert Patrick stop by for dinner, bringing tensions to a boil.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each team must present chef Ramsay with a dish made with king crab; each team gets to create their own menus for the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Feeling lonely after her cat dies, Liz looks for a sperm donor. When Timmy's intellect and innocence don't attract his crush, he tries his hand at playing 'big dog.' Adam rips the vintage wedding dress that Jennifer's family sent her.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cupcake
programme.desc: Russell gets jealous when Timmy manages to outshine him at his own pick-up game. Adam and Jennifer leave pot-laced cupcakes on the kitchen counter, and an unaware Jeff eats one.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fountain Of Youth
programme.desc: After meeting up with college friends who are no longer into partying, Jeff and Audrey set out to prove that even with a baby on the way, they can still have fun. Meanwhile, Timmy attempts to find Russell's compassionate side.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baby Talk
programme.desc: When Audrey bonds with their unborn baby by reading her stories, a paranoid Jeff believes that she is trying to form an alliance against him. Meanwhile, Russell steals an article that Timmy wrote.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Role Play
programme.desc: Jeff promises to take Audrey to an upmarket and very popular restaurant but forgets to book a table. Determined to dine there, he hatches a plan to get in by claiming that a last-minute reservation is needed for a celebrity.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Catering
programme.desc: Brenda enlists Jeff and Audrey's help when she does the catering for an event at Columbia University. While waitressing, Audrey tries to fit in with the guests, only to discover that they are more impressed with Jeff's bartending skills.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cooking Class
programme.desc: The couples attempt to enjoy recreational cooking classes together, but Jeff and Adam can't keep their competitive nature out of the kitchen. Russell doesn't notice how disturbingly similar his new girlfriend is to Timmy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Unpleasant Surprises
programme.desc: When Jennifer learns that the guys have nothing planned for Adam's last weekend as a bachelor, she plans a party weekend. Things don't go as planned, however, so Jeff, Russell, and Timmy must improvise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Timmy Quits
programme.desc: Audrey has always had suspicions that Jeff's old college friend Heidi harbours romantic feelings for him, so Jeff invites Heidi over to prove that this was never the case.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Wee Problem
programme.desc: Jeff does his best to make a heavily pregnant Brenda laugh when he discovers that she has a `wee problem' due to her condition, but his antics cause her waters to break. Meanwhile, Adam annoys Audrey with his non-stop chatter during a spa visit.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.(n)

programme.title: Taking Earth
programme.desc: The human race is thrown into chaos when an alien invasion takes place. But the aliens have arrived for a very specific reason - to find the one boy out of 7 billion people who holds the power to destroy them.(n)

programme.title: Magical Adventures in the Forbidden City
programme.desc: In another world Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed years ago because of a disease. She takes us on a magical adventure, rising against the forces in command and shows how being brave and following your heart can show anything is possible.(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.(n)

programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.(n)

programme.title: The Big Fight
programme.desc: Tien Peng and Cheung Ching-ching play the leaders of a rebel group of Chinese kung fu fighters in a Japanese occupied town at the height of the war.(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.(n)

programme.title: A Screenshot to Santa
programme.desc: In this holiday family film, two sisters left home alone on December 23rd overcome their sibling rivalry as they stave off would-be intruders.(n)

programme.title: Christmas In The City
programme.desc: After closing down her family business, Wendy and her daughter move to the city for a job in the toy department. Her excitement is short lived when the store's consultant ruins the holiday spirit by replacing Santa with a male underwear model.(n)

programme.title: Santa Fake
programme.desc: A young man from Ireland has moved to the United States and finds himself working for a mob boss. When asked to deliver two mysterious briefcases, he ends up in Santa Fe working as a shopping mall Santa and on the run from the police and the mobsters.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story. Ten-year-old Wesley puts together a "Secret Santa" gift for a needy child and when ten-year-old Megan opens the package, she discovers an item that will have a huge impact on her life to come.(n)

programme.title: Evil Doctor
programme.desc: Expectant parents Aubrey and Matt find their lives haunted, and their marriage tested, by an unhinged OB GYN with a mysterious past and who is after their child.(n)

programme.title: Stressed to Death
programme.desc: A former EMT still stricken with PTSD over not being able to save a man's life in time, becomes the target of the victim's wealthy wife who blames her for his death.(n)

programme.title: Watching Over You
programme.desc: Single mom Sarah moves into the suburbs and starts dating a firefighter, only to find herself the target of an obsessive neighborhood watchman who aims to prove he’s the best man to protect her… even if he has to create the danger himself.(n)

programme.title: Grandma Dearest
programme.desc: A psychotic woman goes to murderous lengths to protect her relationship with her new grandchildren.(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Killer
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Catherine Bell) tracks a kidnapper while developing a rapport with his latest victim.(n)

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: Movie producer Thomas Ince (Cary Elwes) dies after yachting with William Randolph Hearst (Edward Herrmann), Charlie Chaplin and Marion Davies (Kirsten Dunst).(n)

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A college student suspects her new stepfather may be having an affair. Her suspicions seem to be confirmed when she sees him with another woman; a woman who is later found dead. She begins to wonder exactly who her mother married.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Girl with a Gun
programme.desc: An outlaw's daughter feels that her father was murdered unjustly and joins his old gang bent on revenge.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Way Station
programme.desc: Jason Barnes takes a job on a railroad with a plan to marry a railroad executive's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Unshakable Man
programme.desc: The story of Amadeo Giannini and the creation of the Bank of America.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Showdown at Kamaaina Flats
programme.desc: When Jeremy objects to his captain on an inhumane slave ship, he is sent into the Hawaiian mountains.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: La Tules
programme.desc: Santa Fe faces an invasion by the American Army and its citizens are forced south.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The Hangtown Fry
programme.desc: A criminal sentenced to hang invents a complicated omelet to delay his execution.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: The $275,000 Sack of Flour
programme.desc: Reuel Gridley pays off a bet by donating a bag of flour to a fund for the Civil War wounded.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Suzie
programme.desc: A husband and wife catch trouble when they allow an Apache chief's granddaughter to stay with them.(n)

programme.title: Death Valley Days: Fort Bowie: Urgent
programme.desc: Officials rush to send word to a bride that an escaped criminal wants to stop her wedding.(n)

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Maire prays that her husband find the strength to let go of their 9 year marriage. Billy is asking that his wife receive the strength and wisdom to hold on. A 8-year-old runaway from heaven takes it upon herself to rekindle the romance that slipped away.(n)

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied, Cassandra Evans prays that her nemesis, Katie Sharp, the queen bee of social media, would know what it's like to walk a day in her shoes. Her prayer is answered in an unexpected way when they get "Switched.(n)

programme.title: Storm Boy
programme.desc: When Michael Kingley, a successful retired businessman starts to see images from his past that he can't explain, he's forced to remember his childhood and how, as a boy, he rescued and raised an extraordinary orphaned pelican, Mr Percival.(n)

programme.title: Unicorn City
programme.desc: To prove leadership skills to a potential employer, Voss, a hardcore gamer entices his gamer buddies to create a utopia, but paradise is disrupted when his former nemesis and guild master decides to wage war for the city and the heart of Voss’ true love.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.(n)

programme.title: To the Public Danger
programme.desc: Four people meet in a pub and enjoy alcohol fuelled thrill seeking until things get out of hand and each person faces a moral choice with long-lasting consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
programme.desc: A quiet tenant at a London boarding house is suspected of being Jack the Ripper in Alfred Hitchcock's silent classic.(n)

programme.title: Sapphire
programme.desc: In 1950s London racial hostility to Commonwealth immigrants is openly paraded. Scotland Yard detectives probe the racially motivated murder of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A baby sitter is terrorised by a homicidal maniac who's escaped from a mental institution to kill his ex-wife.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Smoking Gun
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel search for Al Capone's diamond-encrusted gun at the behest of a man hoping it will clear his grandfather of a murder he was framed for.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Affaire de Coeur
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Scotland to find the second ring of the pair of Twining Rings of Calum and Elena.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Thank You Very Much
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel go to Germany to find a lost Elvis Presley guitar.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Transformation
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Derek Lloyd go to the Peruvian jungle to look for the Paracelsus scrolls which contain the formula for turning lead into gold.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: On the premiere episode of "Quantum Leap," Sam Beckett wakes up in 1956, disoriented, suffering from amnesia, but he has the awful realization that he does not belong there... Part 1 of 2.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the persona of a womanizing college professor in 1972, encounters his lost love (Teri Hatcher) and attempts to reshape the past. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Trust (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante's still impressionable teenage niece, Percy, comes under the sway of a young, handsome psychopath. Her actions inadvertently threaten the life of her uncle.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Order (REDUX)
programme.desc: When a ship of religious cultists commit mass suicide by diving their ship into the sun, the crew rescues a shuttle full of survivors, including the cult leader himself, Brother Thirteen.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Siren's Song (REDUX)
programme.desc: After the crew capture a murderous psychopath named Petrakis, they cross paths with a Major Bartlett, who has a prisoner of his own to move... and military authorization to commandeer the Tulip.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: The Man Who Sold The World (REDUX)
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Sold The World (REDUX)
programme.desc: When Dante and Luc leave the ship to track down a ruthless war criminal, Percy discovers an invasion of the Tulip by a deadly AI.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Peer Pressure (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante brings a captive fugitive aboard, along with her teenage son, Ajit. Percy and Ajit's immediate attraction sparks a conflict which endangers everyone.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Frozen (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante must decide whether to save a scientist and his son from the clutches of the Raiders, or use them as a bargaining chip to find his own child.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Shuffle
programme.desc: Ton and Allen teach a cocky new auction hunter a lesson. They spot a 1940's-era shuffleboard table and uncover an early hot rod made from the fuel tank of a WWII fighter plane!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: High Flying Ton
programme.desc: A nerdy auction buyer tests Ton and Allen's patience at a big container auction in Ventura. The guys discover a basket and burners for a hot air balloon and a 19th century German single shot rifle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.(n)
